TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供 物件的型別轉換子。

span.span: Provides a type converter for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來將連結的一種類型轉換成另一種類型，並將存取標準值和從屬的屬性。Use the class to convert links of one type to another type, and to access standard values and subordinate properties. 存取這個類別可透過。Access this class through .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的轉換是從某個到另一個。The most common conversion is from one to another . 預設實作會呼叫物件上的物件是否有效，而且如果`destinationType`是。The default implementation calls on the object if the object is valid and if the `destinationType` is .
